name: Mantine UI Component Library
description:
Hi everyone!


I am working on building this up to accommodate all the components featured in the Mantine UI Library. Learn more about Mantine here: https://mantine.dev/


This file was built using Auto Layout V3, Variants, Text Styles, and Color Styles, so these components are responsive and customizable.


Updates to come!


Any feedback or suggestions are very welcome! Message me on discord here https://discord.com/channels/669040970901225482/934899994664763422
